verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: claims] [ARG1: Democrats are splitting hairs in the semantics of determining whether the FBI used a ' spy ' or an ' informant ' to keep tabs on his presidential campaign] .
Trump claims Democrats [V: are] splitting hairs in the semantics of determining whether the FBI used a ' spy ' or an ' informant ' to keep tabs on his presidential campaign .
Trump claims Democrats are splitting hairs in the semantics of [V: determining] [ARG1: whether the FBI used a ' spy ' or an ' informant ' to keep tabs on his presidential campaign] .

Trump claims Democrats are splitting hairs in the semantics of determining whether [ARG0: the FBI] [V: used] [ARG1: a ' spy ' or an ' informant '] [ARGM-PRP: to keep tabs on his presidential campaign] .
Trump claims Democrats are splitting hairs in the semantics of determining whether [ARG0: the FBI] used a ' spy ' or an ' informant ' to [V: keep] [ARG1: tabs] [ARG2: on his presidential campaign] .
